TextEng: "I think we need to part ways."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I want you to leave any traps that you see alone."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"I want to move faster and not bother with searching or stealth."
Text: "더 빨리 움직이고 탐색이나 은신은 신경 쓰지 마."

TextEng: "I need you to be stealthy right now."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패해도 돕지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
Text: "날 지키고 내가 공격할 때까지 공격하지 마."

TextEng: "I need you to cast a group of buffing spells."
"Cast all the buffing spells you have."
"Cast all the buffing spells that last a long time."
"Cast all the short duration buffing spells."
"I need you to cast a spell."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Do you have plans for what you're going to do after all this?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 계획이야?"

TextEng: "I'm sure that reward could be put to good use."
Text: "그 보상을 잘 쓸 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "I don't know. I haven't thought about it at all."
"I was thinking of taking some time off."
"I'm sure another adventure will come along."
"I was hoping I could spend more time with you."
Text: "너랑 더 많은 시간을 보낼 수 있으면 좋겠어."

TextEng: "You said you came from Neverwinter, correct?"
"Lord Nasher was generous? He paid well?"
"Did you know the Hero of Neverwinter?"
"Is it true the Hero saved Neverwinter single-handedly?"
"From what I hear, she deserved it."
"I know everything I need to know about them."
"I know they are evil and dark-skinned elves, but that's it."
Text: "사악하고 검은 피부의 엘프라는 건 알지만, 그게 다야."

TextEng: "So the other races of the Underdark hate the drow?"
"Why would their goddess want them to war with each other?"
"Do the drow wish to return to the surface?"
"Isn't there another famous drow outcast named Drizzt?"
Text: "드리즈트라는 유명한 드로우 추방자가 또 있지 않아?"

TextEng: "A fair amount. I am an elf, after all."
"I don't need to hear about him."
"Tell me what you know about him."
"So Undermountain once belonged to the dwarves?"
"How could the drow have taken over?"
"Broke into the Underdark? What do you mean?"
"Why put all the puzzles and monsters in here?"
Text: "왜 여기에 수수께끼랑 괴물들을 다 넣어 둔 거야?"

TextEng: "The elves have tales about him? How old is he?"
Text: "엘프들이 그에 대한 이야기를 가지고 있어? 얼마나 늙었어?"
